cs.HC, cs.GR, cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.AR. 

The paper discusses the future of Augmented Reality (AR) and Virtual Reality (VR) and the implications of their commercial traction. The focus is on the human-computer interaction aspect of AR and VR, which suggests that cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also discusses the technical aspects of AR and VR, such as computer graphics and computer vision, which suggests that cs.GR (Computer Graphics) and cs.CV (Computer Vision) are also likely sub-categories. Additionally, the paper mentions the use of AR and VR in multimedia and entertainment, which suggests that cs.MM (Multimedia) is a likely sub-category. Finally, the paper specifically mentions the term "Augmented Reality" in the title, which suggests that cs.AR (Augmented Reality) is also a likely sub-category.
